creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: small group of men and two well dressed women smoke and engage in various other activities at the center of a wide, flat bottomed boat; a man at the back guides boat with long pole; man on bamboo raft with blue kerchief on head at LLQ; on shore, a group of people look on, one is holding the reins of a horse heavily loaded with casks; another man squats on shore; village scene with fence, roofs, and tall trees in background; mountain in background at R; four triangular stacks of reeds at LR
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

R marg ULQ, in Japanese; URQ, in Japanese
title: Kawasaki, from "53 Stations of the Tokaido Road"
